name: Maybe-usefull-stuff
tagline: A repository with some of my stuff that could be usefull for others.
body:
In 2015 I participated as a teacher in a bioinformatics course on microbial ecology.
For the students we made a virtual machine disk, that was based on the Virtual machine created for QIIME. We just added some more software and tutorials
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
